= Button

[source,bash]
----
pnpx shadcn-vue@latest add button

# pnpx shadcn-ui@latest add button
----

[source,vue,title="src/components/MyComponent.vue"]
----
<script setup lang="ts">
import { Button } from '@/components/ui/button'
</script>

<template>
  <div>
    <Button>Click me</Button>
  </div>
</template>
----
